tasks.task: Discuss grain farming and processing steps
subtasks: Explain the grain farming process (planting, growing, harvesting, threshing, storing)
Describe primary processing of grains (cleaning, grading, hulling, milling, etc.)
Outline the seven steps of agriculture (plowing, sowing, adding nutrients, irrigation, protecting, harvesting, storage)
Identify the five stages of grain growth (germination, seedling, tillering, stem elongation, flowering, etc.)
Detail grain harvesting methods (separate or combined)
List common grains (wheat, barley, oats, quinoa, rye, rice)
Explain tools used in grain farming (tractors, combine harvesters, seeders, etc.)
Provide examples of whole grains
Discuss alternative farming methods (permaculture, hydroponics, etc.)
Describe the life cycle of grains (cultivation, processing, consumption, etc.)
Mention common grain topics (types, preparation methods, importance)
Identify key techniques for cooking grains (boiling, absorption, steaming)
Explain the role of traditional processing methods (milling, grinding)
